turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to place an order at Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I guess I'll have one bacon and mushroom, one Hawaiian, and one meat lover's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of crust do you want on those?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. your order for 3 large pizzas all with thin crust, 1 bacon and mushrooms, 1 hawaiian, and 1 meat lovers comes out to $65.44.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want me to place the order now? or should i change anything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, actually, add extra cheese to all three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've added extra cheese in the order for all 3. the order has increased to $67.88.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i've placed the order. it'll be ready in 35 mins for pick up.
